abstract: The heads of banks that received U.S. money, including Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Regions Financial, took company jets for personal use, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: The heads of banks that received U.S. money, including Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Regions Financial, took company jets for personal use, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Chief executives of some banks that received federal money, including Bank of America , Morgan Stanley and Regions Financial, took company jets for their personal use, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Bailed-Out C.E.O.s Taking Jets for Personal Use
